mapper.select: SELECT id, date, log_time as logTime, server_id as serverId, dist_count as distCount, all_rmb as allRmb, cnt, create_count as createCount, accu, pccu, yb_incr as ybIncr, yb_consume as ybConsume, d_count as dCount, ls_dcount as lsDcount FROM servers_integration_report where server_id = #{serverId} AND date = #{date}
mapper.insert: insert into servers_integration_report( date, log_time, server_id, dist_count, all_rmb, cnt, create_count, accu, pccu, yb_incr, yb_consume, d_count, ls_dcount ) values( #{date}, #{logTime}, #{serverId}, #{distCount}, #{allRmb}, #{cnt}, #{createCount}, #{accu}, #{pccu}, #{ybIncr}, #{ybConsume}, #{dCount}, #{lsDcount} )
mapper.update: update servers_integration_report set date = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), log_time = #{logTime}, server_id = #{serverId}, dist_count = #{distCount}, all_rmb = #allRmb}, cnt = #{cnt}, create_count = #{createCount}, accu = #{accu}, pccu = #{pccu}, yb_incr = #{ybIncr}, yb_consume = #{ybConsume}, d_count = #{dCount}, ls_dcount = #{lsDcount} where server_id = #{serverId} AND date = #{date}
